    • Method Detail

      • get

        public Option get(java.lang.String key)
        Retrieve the option associated with a certain key. If this key doesnt exist, returns the one in the globalScope specified
        Parameters:
        key - - The key to retrieve the option from
        Returns:
        the Object stored in the option or null if an error occurred.

      • getValue

        public java.lang.Object getValue(java.lang.String key)
        If the object is an Option, return its value else returns its value
        Parameters:
        key - - The key to retrive the option from
        Returns:
        the Object stored in the option or null if the object doesnt exist

      • put

        public java.lang.Object put(java.lang.String key,
                            java.lang.Object value)
        Rewrites the put method to transform the controls into Options before putting it in the array.
        Parameters:
        key - key with witch the value will be associated with
        value - value at that key
        Returns:
        the object at the previous key (always an option)

      • putWithGlobalScopeDefault

        public void putWithGlobalScopeDefault(java.lang.String key)
        Puts an entry with value of the global scope
        Parameters:
        key - key to retrieve the value in the global scope and to set it in the scope

      • generatePanel

        public javafx.scene.Node generatePanel()
        Generates a javafx layout depending on the type of the controls in the scope
        Returns:
        The javafx layout.

      • setGlobalScope

        public void setGlobalScope(Scope scope)
        Sets a global scope to the current scope
        Parameters:
        scope - the global scope

      • globalKeySet

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> globalKeySet()
        Returns:
        The global key.

      • specificKeySet

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> specificKeySet()
        Returns:
        a specific key set (every key that isn't in the global scope)

      • isGlobalScope

        public boolean isGlobalScope()
        Returns:
        true if this scope is global, false other

      • existLocal

        public boolean existLocal(java.lang.String key)
        Checks if the this key is local or not
        Parameters:
        key - the key to check
        Returns:
        true if the key is local, false otherwise
